title: COVID-19 Hotline
author: editor3
excerpt: Statewide COVID-19 Hotline 833‑422‑4255 (833-4CA-4ALL) The statewide call center will be open 7 days a week: 8:00 am to 8:00 pm Monday – Friday, Pacific Daylight Time.    Saturday and Sunday  8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Pacific Daylight Time.
